entities.name: Professor Binns
entities.description: The ghost who taught History of Magic. He is mentioned as assigning weekly essays on the goblin rebellions of the eighteenth century.

entities.name: Professor Snape
entities.description: He is forcing students to research antidotes, hinting that he might be poisoning one of them before Christmas to see if their antidote worked.

entities.name: Professor Flitwick
entities.description: He asked students to read three extra books in preparation for their lesson on Summoning Charms.

entities.name: Hagrid
entities.description: He is adding to the workload of students, delighted with the growth of Blast-Ended Skrewts and suggesting that they come down to his hut as part of their project.

entities.name: Blast-Ended Skrewts
entities.description: They are growing at a remarkable pace, but nobody has yet discovered what they eat.
